metadata.name: The Commitment
metadata.description: A reminder of where I come from, where I am born (the land of ice). This college commitment NFT to THE UNIVERSITY OF ARIZONA is the first of its kind, much like when I continue my journey into professional baseball, I will be the first of my kind. I am proud and excited to kick off this journey with Limitless through this NFT. Many years of hard work have made me who I am today and put me in the position to be sharing this piece of history. My life has taught me a lot about the world around me and most of all who I am in it. I hope to share this journey with you all through this collection and the future of LIMITLESS. I will continue to grow and evolve, and this process will have changed peoples lives, so join me as I step into the never ending possibilities of my career.
